execution_quality: The agent executed the git commit and push operations successfully, completing the first request. However, the follow-up request about re-posting to Discord was not addressed, leaving work incomplete.

However, the agent did not address the immediate follow-up request about re-posting to Discord, resulting in partial task completion across the full user request sequence. The work was on-track but the agent failed to transition to the next user directive.
